00062 // ===========================================================================
00063 // definitions
00064 // ===========================================================================
00065 #define INVALID_VALUE -1
00066 #define INVALID_VALUE_STR "-1"
00067 
00068 
00069 // ===========================================================================
00070 // FOX callback mapping
00071 // ===========================================================================
00072 FXDEFMAP(GUIDialog_Breakpoints) GUIDialog_BreakpointsMap[] = {
00073     FXMAPFUNC(SEL_COMMAND,  MID_CHOOSEN_LOAD,                   GUIDialog_Breakpoints::onCmdLoad),
00074     FXMAPFUNC(SEL_COMMAND,  MID_CHOOSEN_SAVE,                   GUIDialog_Breakpoints::onCmdSave),
00075     FXMAPFUNC(SEL_COMMAND,  MID_CHOOSEN_CLEAR,                  GUIDialog_Breakpoints::onCmdClear),
00076     FXMAPFUNC(SEL_COMMAND,  MID_CANCEL,                         GUIDialog_Breakpoints::onCmdClose),
00077     FXMAPFUNC(SEL_CHANGED,  MFXAddEditTypedTable::ID_TEXT_CHANGED,  GUIDialog_Breakpoints::onCmdEditTable),
00078 };
00079 
00080 
00081 FXIMPLEMENT(GUIDialog_Breakpoints, FXMainWindow, GUIDialog_BreakpointsMap, ARRAYNUMBER(GUIDialog_BreakpointsMap))

00083 
00084 // ===========================================================================
00085 // method definitions
00086 // ===========================================================================
00087 GUIDialog_Breakpoints::GUIDialog_Breakpoints(GUIMainWindow* parent)
00088     : FXMainWindow(parent->getApp(), "Breakpoints Editor", NULL, NULL, DECOR_ALL, 20, 20, 300, 300),
00089       myParent(parent) {
00090     FXHorizontalFrame* hbox = new FXHorizontalFrame(this, LAYOUT_FILL_X | LAYOUT_FILL_Y, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0);
00091 
00092     // build the table
00093     myTable = new MFXAddEditTypedTable(hbox, this, MID_TABLE, LAYOUT_FILL_X | LAYOUT_FILL_Y);
00094     myTable->setVisibleRows(20);
00095     myTable->setVisibleColumns(1);
00096     myTable->setTableSize(20, 1);
00097     myTable->setBackColor(FXRGB(255, 255, 255));
00098     myTable->setCellType(0, CT_REAL);
00099     SUMOTime begin = string2time(OptionsCont::getOptions().getString("begin"));
00100     SUMOTime end = string2time(OptionsCont::getOptions().getString("end"));
00101     if (end < 0) {
00102         end = SUMOTime_MAX;
00103     }
00104     myTable->setNumberCellParams(0, begin / 1000, end / 1000, 1, 10, 100, "%.2f");
00105     myTable->getRowHeader()->setWidth(0);
00106     rebuildList();
00107     // build the layout
00108     FXVerticalFrame* layout = new FXVerticalFrame(hbox, LAYOUT_TOP, 0, 0, 0, 0, 4, 4, 4, 4);
00109     // "Load"
00110     new FXButton(layout, "Load\t\t", 0, this, MID_CHOOSEN_LOAD, ICON_BEFORE_TEXT | LAYOUT_FILL_X | FRAME_THICK | FRAME_RAISED, 0, 0, 0, 0, 4, 4, 3, 3);
00111     // "Save"
00112     new FXButton(layout, "Save\t\t", 0, this, MID_CHOOSEN_SAVE, ICON_BEFORE_TEXT | LAYOUT_FILL_X | FRAME_THICK | FRAME_RAISED, 0, 0, 0, 0, 4, 4, 3, 3);
00113     new FXHorizontalSeparator(layout, SEPARATOR_GROOVE | LAYOUT_FILL_X);
00114     // "Clear List"
00115     new FXButton(layout, "Clear\t\t", 0, this, MID_CHOOSEN_CLEAR, ICON_BEFORE_TEXT | LAYOUT_FILL_X | FRAME_THICK | FRAME_RAISED, 0, 0, 0, 0, 4, 4, 3, 3);
00116     new FXHorizontalSeparator(layout, SEPARATOR_GROOVE | LAYOUT_FILL_X);
00117     // "Close"
00118     new FXButton(layout, "Close\t\t", 0, this, MID_CANCEL, ICON_BEFORE_TEXT | LAYOUT_FILL_X | FRAME_THICK | FRAME_RAISED, 0, 0, 0, 0, 4, 4, 3, 3);
00119     //
00120     setIcon(GUIIconSubSys::getIcon(ICON_APP_BREAKPOINTS));
00121     myParent->addChild(this);
00122 }
00123 
00124 
00125 GUIDialog_Breakpoints::~GUIDialog_Breakpoints() {
00126     myParent->removeChild(this);
00127 }
00128 
00129 
00130 void
00131 GUIDialog_Breakpoints::rebuildList() {
00132     myTable->clearItems();
00133     sort(gBreakpoints.begin(), gBreakpoints.end());
00134     // set table attributes
00135     myTable->setTableSize((FXint) gBreakpoints.size() + 1, 1);
00136     myTable->setColumnText(0, "Time");
00137     FXHeader* header = myTable->getColumnHeader();
00138     header->setHeight(getApp()->getNormalFont()->getFontHeight() + getApp()->getNormalFont()->getFontAscent());
00139     int k;
00140     for (k = 0; k < 1; k++) {
00141         header->setItemJustify(k, JUSTIFY_CENTER_X);
00142     }
00143     // insert into table
00144     FXint row = 0;
00145     std::vector<int>::iterator j;
00146     for (j = gBreakpoints.begin(); j != gBreakpoints.end(); ++j) {
00147         myTable->setItemText(row, 0, time2string(*j).c_str());
00148         row++;
00149     }
00150     // insert dummy last field
00151     for (k = 0; k < 1; k++) {
00152         myTable->setItemText(row, k, " ");
00153     }
00154 }
00155 
00156 
00157 long
00158 GUIDialog_Breakpoints::onCmdLoad(FXObject*, FXSelector, void*) {
00159     FXFileDialog opendialog(this, "Save Breakpoints");
00160     opendialog.setIcon(GUIIconSubSys::getIcon(ICON_EMPTY));
00161     opendialog.setSelectMode(SELECTFILE_ANY);
00162     opendialog.setPatternList("*.txt");
00163     if (gCurrentFolder.length() != 0) {
00164         opendialog.setDirectory(gCurrentFolder);
00165     }
00166     if (opendialog.execute()) {
00167         gCurrentFolder = opendialog.getDirectory();
00168         std::string file = opendialog.getFilename().text();
00169         std::ifstream strm(file.c_str());
00170         while (strm.good()) {
00171             std::string val;
00172             strm >> val;
00173             try {
00174                 SUMOTime value = string2time(val);
00175                 gBreakpoints.push_back(value);
00176             } catch (NumberFormatException&) {
00177                 WRITE_ERROR(" A breakpoint-value must be an int, is:" + val);
00178             } catch (EmptyData&) {}
00179         }
00180         rebuildList();
00181     }
00182     return 1;
00183 }
00184 
00185 
00186 long
00187 GUIDialog_Breakpoints::onCmdSave(FXObject*, FXSelector, void*) {
00188     FXString file = MFXUtils::getFilename2Write(this, "Save Breakpoints", ".txt", GUIIconSubSys::getIcon(ICON_EMPTY), gCurrentFolder);
00189     if (file == "") {
00190         return 1;
00191     }
00192     std::string content = encode2TXT();
00193     try {
00194         OutputDevice& dev = OutputDevice::getDevice(file.text());
00195         dev << content;
00196         dev.close();
00197     } catch (IOError& e) {
00198         FXMessageBox::error(this, MBOX_OK, "Storing failed!", e.what());
00199     }
00200     return 1;
00201 }
00202 
00203 
00204 std::string
00205 GUIDialog_Breakpoints::encode2TXT() {
00206     std::ostringstream strm;
00207     std::sort(gBreakpoints.begin(), gBreakpoints.end());
00208     for (std::vector<int>::iterator j = gBreakpoints.begin(); j != gBreakpoints.end(); ++j) {
00209         if ((*j) != INVALID_VALUE) {
00210             strm << time2string(*j) << std::endl;
00211         }
00212     }
00213     return strm.str();
00214 }
00215 
00216 
00217 long
00218 GUIDialog_Breakpoints::onCmdClear(FXObject*, FXSelector, void*) {
00219     gBreakpoints.clear();
00220     rebuildList();
00221     return 1;
00222 }

00225 
00226 long
00227 GUIDialog_Breakpoints::onCmdClose(FXObject*, FXSelector, void*) {
00228     close(true);
00229     return 1;
00230 }
00231 
00232 
00233 long
00234 GUIDialog_Breakpoints::onCmdEditTable(FXObject*, FXSelector, void* data) {
00235     MFXEditedTableItem* i = (MFXEditedTableItem*) data;
00236     std::string value = i->item->getText().text();
00237     // check whether the inserted value is empty
00238     if (value.find_first_not_of(" ") == std::string::npos) {
00239         // replace by invalid if so
00240         value = INVALID_VALUE_STR;
00241     }
00242     int row = i->row;
00243     if (row == (int) gBreakpoints.size()) {
00244         gBreakpoints.push_back(INVALID_VALUE);
00245     }
00246 
00247     switch (i->col) {
00248         case 0:
00249             try {
00250                 gBreakpoints[row] = string2time(value);
00251             } catch (NumberFormatException&) {
00252                 std::string msg = "The value must be an int, is:" + value;
00253                 FXMessageBox::error(this, MBOX_OK, "Number format error", msg.c_str());
00254             }
00255             break;
00256         default:
00257             break;
00258     }
00259     if (!i->updateOnly) {
00260         rebuildList();
00261     }
00262     return 1;
00263 }
